alert.note: Alert for Christian; Stone; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 10:18PM CDT until August 13 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Taney County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Christian County in southwestern Missouri... Central Stone County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1018 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Reeds Spring, or 8 miles northwest of Branson, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Branson, Lake Taneycomo, Table Rock Lake, Bull Shoals Lake, Shepherd of the Hills State Park, Hollister, Silver Dollar City, Kimberling City, Forsyth, Merriam Woods, Kissee Mills, Reeds Spring, Rockaway Beach, Bull Creek, Indian Point, Branson West, Galena, Taneyville, Mccord Bend and Table Rock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
